comment: * The BatteryState class is a representation of a single battery on a device.

variables.name: STATUS_NOT_CHARGING
variables.comment: Battery is connected to power but not charging.

methods.name: public abstract boolean isPresent()
methods.comment:
* Check whether the hardware has a battery.
     *
     * @return True if the hardware has a battery, else false.

methods.name: public abstract int getStatus()
methods.comment:
* Get the battery status.
     *
     * @return the battery status.

methods.name: public abstract float getCapacity()
methods.comment:
* Get remaining battery capacity as float percentage [0.0f, 1.0f] of total capacity
     * Returns NaN when battery capacity can't be read.
     *
     * @return the battery capacity.
